result.execSummary:
The defendant Darren L Losh was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall contact the Iron County Sheriff's Department at (715) 561-2440 within 10 business days of sentencing to make arrangements to provide a DNA sample.  Defendant shall also pay the surcharge for same.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Darren L Losh

records.addlTxt: Defendant Darren L Losh not in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case at 10:48 a.m.  STC to review DEJ.  Def is in compliance.  Order to Dismiss to be filed when appropriate.  Adj.  10:49 a.m.  klr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Review - Deferred Prosecution on May 2, 2018 at 10:00 am.
Order to Reimburse Iron County for Attorney Fees with attached invoice.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 15, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Darren L Losh in court with attorney Sam Joseph Filippo.  Frederick j Schellgell appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    DA calls case, cites appearances.  PTC held.  Per DA, plea to be entered 10 days from today.  DA states agreement to court but paperwork not completed yet.  PLQ/Waiver of rights filed by atty Filippo.  Defendant understands and attorney Filippo understands that agreement will be a "contract".  DA requests a signature bond and that cash bond posted be returned to poster.  Court amends bond to signature with same conditions.  Bond contines until DEJ filed.  Attorney fees to be paid within 60 days of submission of bill unless other arrangements made with clerk of court.  klr
No alcohol, no bars, no illegal substances.  No contact with D.L.
Pre-trial conference on November 29, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Darren L Losh in court with attorney Sam Joseph Filippo.  Frederick j Schellgell appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case, cites appearances.  States charges.  Def waives TL for prelim but asks for rt to prelim to be preserved.  Court extends time limits, preserves all rights.  Bond to continue as established.  Adj 10:06.  klr
Adjourned initial appearance on October 11, 2016 at 09:30 am.
for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency and Order
Adjourned initial appearance on October 4, 2016 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Darren L Losh in court.  Martin J. Lipske appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case.  Defendant does not have atty yet.  Complaint has been served.  Rights explained to def re atty.  Court interviews defendant re assets/income.  Court appoints Dan Johns.  Order signed and given to defendant for signature.  Per Court, all rights are preserved.  Case to be rescheduled in two weeks unless waiver filed by attorney Johns re prelim.  klr
for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency and Order Appointing Dan Johns.

Darren Losh appeared in court uprepresented.  Martin J. Lipske appeared for the State of wisconsin.  Public defender information given.  Rights to attorney explained to def.  Def is employed at Nasi Roofing.  Is hiring own attorney.   Schedule adnourned initial app for 9/26/16 at 10:30.  DA requests $500 cash bond with conditions of no contact with D.L., no alcohol, no bars, no illegal substances.  Court sets bond as requested.  klr
No alcohol, no bars, no illegal substances.  No contact with D.L.
